snippet.title: Scratching my design itch - Steve Clayton - Site Home ...‎
snippet.description: The Story of Eames furniture is now officially on my wish list. Last week I splashed out and bought an Eames Lounge Chair. They’re ridiculously expensive ...

snippet.title: Hotel rooms of the future - Next at Microsoft - Site Home ...‎
snippet.description: It includes such luxuries as an Eames chair that looks like the real thing but is sustainably manufactured and a robotic bartender who can make a perfect cocktail ...

snippet.title: How do you sell a chair? - Steve Clayton - Site Home ...‎
snippet.description: But look, they also have the Eames chair which passes the architecture council (aka Anna) that presides over everything that enters our home.

snippet.title: What’s in Microsoft’s What’s Next booth at CES ...‎
snippet.description: ... 2.0 – sporting a set of wooden legs that have a definite Charles and Ray Eames look. This thing is going to look so good in my house next to my lounge chair.
